chapter.pericope: Woe to the Oppressors of God’s People

ul.li1: 1Woe to those who plan wickedness
ul.li2: and evil deeds upon their beds!
ul.li1: In the light of the morning they did it,
ul.li2: because they have power in their hands.
ul.li1: 2They covet fields and seize them,
ul.li2: and houses, and they take them away.
ul.li1: They oppress a man and his house;
ul.li2: a man and his inheritance.

chapter.p: 3Therefore, thus says Yahweh: Look! I am planning disaster against this family from which you will not be able to remove your necks. You will not walk proudly, for it is a time of disaster.

ul.li1: 4In that day they will raise a proverb against you,
ul.li2: and will wail a bitter wailing, saying,
ul.li1: “We are utterly ruined;
ul.li2: he exchanges the portion of my people.
ul.li1: How he removes it from me;
ul.li2: he apportions our field to an apostate.”
ul.li1: 5Therefore you will have no one casting a line by lot
ul.li2: in the assembly of Yahweh.
ul.li1: 6“Do not preach!” they are preaching.
ul.li2: They should not preach to these;
disgrace will not overtake us.
ul.li1: 7Should this be said, O house of Jacob?
ul.li2: Is the patienceOr “spirit” of Yahweh shortened?
Are these his deeds?
ul.li1: Are my words not pleasing
ul.li2: to him who walks upright?
ul.li1: 8But recentlyLiterally “yesterday” my people have risen up as an enemy;
ul.li2: from before the cloak you strip off the robe
ul.li1: from those passing by in confidence,
ul.li2: returning from war.
ul.li1: 9You have driven out the women of my people
ul.li2: from the houses of theirHebrew “her” pleasure.
ul.li1: From theirHebrew “her” children you have taken away
ul.li2: my glory forever.
ul.li1: 10Arise and go,
ul.li2: for this is no resting place,
ul.li1: on account of uncleanness that destroys
ul.li2: with painful destruction.
ul.li1: 11If a man walks about in a spirit of deception and lies,
ul.li2: saying “I will preach to you of wine and strong drink,”
then he would be a preacher for this people!
ul.li1: 12I will surely gather all of you, O Jacob;
ul.li2: I will surely gather together the remainder of Israel.
ul.li1: I will set them like sheep of Bozrah.
Like a herd in the midst of their pasture
ul.li2: they will be in tumult from people.
ul.li1: 13The one who breaks out before them goes up;
ul.li2: they break through and pass the gate,
going out through it.
ul.li1: Their king passes before them,
ul.li2: Yahweh at their head.
